headline: Bunge Limited Finance Corp. Announces Expiration and Final Results of Exchange Offers
summary: ST. LOUIS, July 07, 2025--Bunge Global SA (NYSE: BG) ("Bunge"), today announced the expiration and final results of the previously announced (A) offers to exchange (each an "Exchange Offer" and, collectively the "Exchange Offers") by its wholly-owned subsidiary, Bunge Limited Finance Corp. ("BLFC"), of any and all outstanding 2.000% Notes due 2026 (the "Existing Viterra 2026 Notes"), 4.900% Notes due 2027 (the "Existing Viterra 2027 Notes"), 3.200% Notes due 2031 (the "Existing Viterra 2031 Note
